title: Can This Technology Protect Bicyclists From The Dreaded 'Right Hook'?
text:
Published By: Forbes.com: Latest News - Today 
Honda LaneWatch displays a cyclist in the blind spot. (Source: Honda) In bicycle-speak, a Right Hook is when a car makes a right-hand turn--...
